程序包 com.ae2dms

类 GameEngine

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
This class controls the interact between program and players.
从以下版本开始:
24 Oct, 2020
版本:
1.0
作者:
Source code provided by UNNC COMP2059. Modified by Gaole DAI(20124917), scygd1@nottingham.edu.cn

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    static java.lang.String GAME_NAME
    This public static final String variable GAME_NAME defines the name of the game.
    static GameLogger logger
    This public static GameLogger variable logger stores the log of the game.
    java.lang.String mapSetName
    This public String variable mapSetName.
    int movesCount
    This public int variable movesCount counts the step of the movements.

    • GAME_NAME

      public static final java.lang.String GAME_NAME
      This public static final String variable GAME_NAME defines the name of the game.
      另请参阅:

    • logger

      public static GameLogger logger
      This public static GameLogger variable logger stores the log of the game.

      public int movesCount
      This public int variable movesCount counts the step of the movements.

      This public String variable mapSetName.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameEngine

      public GameEngine​(java.io.InputStream input, boolean production)
      Constructor that try to create game logger every time create a new GameEngine object.

      If fail to create, then catch the exception and give error message or error trace.

      参数:
      input - InputStream type. The game stream to read.
      production - boolean Unused.

  • 方法详细资料

    • isDebugActive

      public static boolean isDebugActive()
      This method returns the boolean variable debug.

      If have bug then return true, else, return false.

      返回:
      a boolean value debug.

    • handleKey

      public void handleKey​(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code)
      This method handles the key input.

      key 'UP' for go upward one unit, key 'RIGHT' for go rightward one unit, key 'DOWN' for go downward one unit and key 'LEFT' for go leftward one unit.

      参数:
      code - KeyCode type. Key input from the player.

    • isGameComplete

      public boolean isGameComplete()
      This method returns whether the game is completed.
      返回:
      boolean value

    • getNextLevel

      public Level getNextLevel()
      This method returns the next level.
      返回:
      Level

    • getCurrentLevel

      public Level getCurrentLevel()
      This method returns the current level.
      返回:
      Level

    • toggleDebug

      public void toggleDebug()
      This method negates the debug variable.
